input_text.Prompt:
Product name:
Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System

Product keywords:
1/2 hp cast iron shallow well jet pump conventional tank system with 12 gallon horizontal tank
1/2 hp; max. Flow rate is 420 gallons per hour; (50 psi)
3/4 in. Npt discharge with 1-1/4 in. Suction
Dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor (factory set for 240V)
Pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 psi for automatic operation
Assembled in US with foreign and domestic parts
Durable cast iron volute with dedicated priming port for volute filling. For wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Hello! I'd be happy to help answer any questions you have about the Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System.

Here are some key features and benefits of this product:

* 1/2 hp cast iron shallow well jet pump with a maximum flow rate of 420 gallons per hour and a pressure switch pre-set at 30-50 psi for automatic operation.
* Conventional tank system with a 12 gallon horizontal tank and a durable cast iron volute with a dedicated priming port for volute filling.
* Suitable for wells ranging in depth from 0 to 25 feet.
* Dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor (factory set for 240V) for reliable performance.
* Assembled in the US with foreign and domestic parts for quality and durability.

If you have any specific questions about this product, please feel free to ask and I will do my best to assist you.
input_text.Response B: The Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System is a 1/2 horsepower cast iron shallow well jet pump conventional tank system with a 12 gallon horizontal tank. It has a 3/4 inch NPT discharge with a 1-1/4 inch suction, and a dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor that is factory set to 240V. The pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 PSI for automatic operation. This pump is assembled in the US with foreign and domestic parts. It is durable, with a cast iron volute and a dedicated priming port for volute filling. It can be used for wells between 0 feet and 25 feet in depth.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
